ygData.subject: Re: Exploring the windmills
ygData.msgSnippet: I did kill her once.  All she dropped was a micro servo.  Of possible note is that at times she just starts walking out into nowhere, towards the valley in
ygData.messageBody:
I did kill her once. All she dropped was a micro servo. Of possible
note is that at times she just starts walking out into nowhere, towards
the valley in front of the ledge where Feddi Dooger spawns, Ive never
followed her though. (This info is from p4, as I havent been bold enough
to go around killing gnomes with my character in retail ;)

Folimun Moonblaze - Gnome Wizard on Brell Serilis

Nilen23@... wrote:
>
> From: Nilen23@...
>
> I don't now what he drops but there is another lower level gnome npc that
> stands near the path in front of the windmills. You get a faction hit for
> killing her against gnomes and she cons blue to me at 9. Anyone kill her
> recently? And if so what loot does that one have.
